MsgJp:
白竜により、かつて大地から切り離された都
レスタニアとは隔てられた異界に漂い、時の流れも
異なっている。現在は地上で見られなくなった
錬金技術が随所にほどこされ、秘術で生み出された
錬魔は今も亡都を守護している
MsgEn:
The city once cut off from the earth by The White
Dragon.
Now drifts in a different realm, no longer seen
in Lestania.
Time flows differently here.
Alchemized technology, which has disappeared from
the surface, is still present throughout, and the
city is protected by guardian spirits created
through secret spells.

MsgJp:
300年の昔に地上から失われた都
旧王都として錬金術師により統治され、栄華を
極めた。だが、白竜によりレスタニアから
切り離されて後、異界を漂い続けている
今なお僅かな民が生存している
MsgEn:
300 years ago, the ancient capital that
disappeared from the earth's surface was ruled by
alchemists and flourished.
However, after being separated from Lestania by
the White Dragon, it continues to drift in the
otherworld.
Even now, only a few people survive.

MsgJp:
錬金術師テオドールの工房
錬金術に関する様々な書物や研究資材が並ぶ
ディアマンテスに抵抗する者、そして
《アルケミスト》を志す者にとっては重要な
場所である
MsgEn:
The workshop of alchemist Theodor.
Various books and research materials related to
alchemy are lined up.
It is an important place for those who resist
Diamantes and aspire to be Alchemists.

MsgJp:
ディアマンテスが封じられた元・王の間
レスタニアからメルゴダが切り離されて後も
その影響力は大きく、力までも完全に
封じることはできなかった
MsgEn:
The former king's space where Diamantes was
sealed.
Even after Mergoda was separated from Lestania,
its influence remained significant and its power
could not be completely sealed.

MsgJp:
未完成状態の素材錬魔が暴走し、研究室に踏み
入った者に攻撃を加えるようになった
完成前とはいえ、監視索敵用に特別開発されるはず
だった魔物のようだ
小型の未完成品と侮ってはいけない
MsgEn:
An incomplete material-altering creature has gone
berserk and started attacking anyone who enters
the laboratory. It was supposed to be specially
developed for surveillance and reconnaissance,
even though it is not yet complete. Do not
underestimate this small unfinished product.

MsgJp:
護政区の研究者であった錬金術師の家
すでに主は不在だが、研究成果や遺物は
遺されているかもしれない
それが、どういった内容であるかは不明
MsgEn:
The home of an alchemist who was a researcher in
the Security District.
The master is already absent, but there may be
alchemized research results and artifacts left
behind.
It is unclear what the contents are.

MsgJp:
メルガン技師の研究室
技師の中にも、竜を排すという異端思想に傾倒
した者が少なからずいた。そういった思想の信徒が
使っていた研究室は封鎖、監視対象となっている
ここも、何らかの研究のため使われていたようだ
MsgEn:
Laboratory of Engineer Mergan.
Here, there were some who were inclined towards
the heretical idea of rejecting dragons.
The research facility used by those who believed
in such ideas has been shut down and placed under
surveillance.
It seems that this place was also used for some
kind of research.

MsgJp:
宮殿前広場に、ディアマンテス派メルガン技師が
魔道兵器ギガン・マキナを改造し配置している
この兵器はあまりに危険なため、広場を通る
際は周到な戦闘準備が必要となる
MsgEn:
In front of the palace plaza, Diamantes faction
Melgan engineers have modified the magic weapon
Gigant Machina.
As this weapon is extremely dangerous, thorough
combat preparations are necessary when passing
through the plaza.

MsgJp:
亡都メルゴダ　王宮層にある廃墟
元の住民のものと思しき大量の書籍もそのままに
打ち捨てられている。すっかり荒れ果ててはいるが
異端思想に傾倒する者たちが未だに集会所として
いるとの噂がある
MsgEn:
Mergoda Ruins, located in the royal palace layer,
is a deserted place where the remnants of the
original residents, including a large number of
books, remain untouched. Although it is completely
in ruins, there are rumors that people who lean
towards heretical ideologies still use it as a
gathering place.

MsgJp:
王宮内研究室、メルガン・アルケミデアで
あのズールと思しき魔物が目撃された
どうやら、錬金術師が複製体の創造
に成功したらしい。複製体が意思を持つ前に
どうにか食い止めなければならない
MsgEn:
In the royal research laboratory, Mergan
Alchemdia, the enemy that appears to be Zuhl has
been sighted.
It seems that the alchemists have succeeded in
creating a duplicate.
We must somehow stop it before the duplicate
gains consciousness.

MsgJp:
亡都メルゴダの元は市街地であった区画
整理され美しかったであろう街並みの
様子は、遺跡群からも見てとれる
今なおメルゴダの民が暮らす地でもある
MsgEn:
The Mergoda Ruins was originally a district in
the city, which must have been organized and
beautiful. This can also be seen from the remnants
where the people of Mergoda still live.

MsgJp:
亡都メルゴダの王ゴルゴラン、そして政権を握る
ディアマンテスら特別な錬金術師たちが集った
壮麗なる王宮
広い研究所や宮殿は現在も巨人兵が護りつづけ
ており、支配者の影響力を強く残している
MsgEn:
The magnificent palace where Golgorran, the king
of the exiled city of Mergoda, and the special
alchemists led by Diamantes who hold political
power, gathered.
The large laboratories and palaces are still
guarded by Giant soldiers, preserving the strong
influence of the rulers.

MsgJp:
<COL ffdc78>【昌石】の扉あり</COL>
女性錬金術師ペトラネアが、自宅の地下に密かに
併設した実験場。秘術によって錬魔や不死者に
特殊なエレメントを付与する研究や、人間を
魔物に変える残酷な実験がここで繰り返し行われた
MsgEn:
<COL ffdc78>【Gemstone】 Door</COL>
Petranea, a female alchemist, secretly
established an experimental facility in the
basement of her home.
Research of bestowing special elements to
alchemized demons and immortals through secret
arts, as well as cruel experiments that transform
humans into monsters, were repeatedly conducted
here.

MsgJp:
突如レスタニアの沖合に出現したフィンダム
大陸の一部。レスタニアに出現した侵食魔も
ここから飛来しており、この絶海の孤島が
“侵食”という脅威に対抗するための手がかりを
秘めていると予測される
MsgEn:
Phindym suddenly appeared off the coast of
Lestania.
The invading corrupted creatures from the
continent fly in from here.
It is predicted that this isolated island in the
vast sea holds clues to opposing the threat of
"corruption."

MsgJp:
魔赤島の北西部、最も高い断崖に近い一帯
何層にも崖が重なったような複雑な地形を
しており、滑落には特に注意が必要
MsgEn:
A complex terrain resembling layers of
overlapping cliffs found in the northwestern part
of Bloodbane Isle.
Special attention must be paid to the risk of
falling.

MsgJp:
魔赤島の北東部、一際標高が高い一帯
空に渦巻く何らかのエネルギー体に
最も近く、赤く照らされている
MsgEn:
In the northeastern part of Bloodbane Isle, there
is an especially high elevation area,
where some kind of energy body swirls in the sky
close to it and illuminating it in red.

MsgJp:
魔赤島における調査のために自然洞窟を
整備して駐屯地とした
侵食が進む魔赤島において、状態が良く
広さも申し分ない洞窟を発見できたことは
調査隊にとってまさに奇跡的な幸運であった
MsgEn:
A natural cave developed and turned into a base
camp for the investigation of Bloodbane Isle.
In the rapidly deteriorating island plagued by
Corruption, it was truly a miraculous stroke of
luck for the research team to discover a cave that
was not only in good condition but also spacious
enough to meet their needs.

MsgJp:
《群像の岩屋》近くの広場
高所から流れ落ちる雄大な滝を見ることが
できる。ただし、日光を避ける傾向にある
はずの侵食魔や菌胞がその勢力を日向にまで
拡げている、侵食の勢いが強い場所でもある
MsgEn:
Nearby the Picturesque Grotto, there is a plaza
where you can witness the majestic waterfall
cascading down from a high place. However, the
corruption and infected fungi, which are supposed
to avoid direct sunlight, have extended their
influence even to the sunny areas. It is a place
where the force of corruption is strong.

MsgJp:
肉食の魔物が獲物を貯蓄しているらしく
おびただしい数の死肉が散乱している
死肉の臭いが新たなる魔物を呼ぶため
それを漁る魔物は増加の一路を辿って
いるようだ
MsgEn:
It appears that the carnivorous monsters are
storing their prey.
An enormous amount of dead flesh is scattered
around.
The smell of the dead flesh is attracting new
monsters, and the monsters that are scavenging for
it seem to be increasing.

MsgJp:
《聖遺の塔》付近にある広場
海から吹き込む風が周囲を囲む崖面に
当たることで複雑な気流を生み出している
気流に誘い込まれてか、風を好んでか
有翼の魔物の姿がよく確認される
MsgEn:
Plaza near the Sage Tower Ruins
The wind blowing in from the sea creates complex
air currents as it hits the surrounding cliffs.
Winged Beasts are often seen in this area,
seemingly drawn by these air currents or perhaps
attracted to the wind.

MsgJp:
魔赤島中心部に位置する侵食の進んだ洞窟
洞窟入口周辺には溢れ出したかのように大量の
菌胞がはびこっている。内部の侵食がかなり
進んでいることは確実であり、慎重を期した
調査が望まれる
MsgEn:
Located in the central part of Bloodbane Isle,
the cave is heavily corrupted.
In the vicinity of the cave entrance, there is an
overwhelming amount of fungal spores spreading.
The internal infection is considerable, and a
cautious investigation is desired.

MsgJp:
<COL ffdc78>【財宝】の扉あり</COL>
南部の海岸沿いの小道の先に発見された地下通路
内部の気温は地上と比べて数度低めである
単なる通路ではなく、遺跡のような造りになっており
崩れた人工物からは文化の一端が垣間見える
MsgEn:
<COL ffdc78>【Treasure】Door</COL>
An underground passage was discovered at the end
of a small path along the southern coast.
The temperature inside is a few degrees lower
compared to the surface.
It is not just a simple passage but is
constructed like a ruin, and glimpses of a culture
can be seen from the collapsed artifacts.

MsgJp:
魔赤島東部の海岸沿いに発見された洞窟
入口付近を調査した斥候隊により、微動だにしない
多数の人影を見たという報告が寄せられている
恐らく何らかの魔物による犠牲者の姿かと思われる
ため、軽率に足を踏み入れることは禁じられている
MsgEn:
Cave discovered along the coast in the eastern
part of Bloodbane Isle
Reports have been received from the scouting
party who investigated the entrance area, saying
that they saw numerous figures that didn't move
even a bit.
It is likely that these are the victims of some
kind of enemy.
Therefore, it is forbidden to step inside without
caution.

MsgJp:
魔赤島南部にある洞窟
斥候隊により、侵食ゴアサイクロプスがここを
ねぐらとしていることが判明している
残飯を狙ってか別種の魔物も多数棲みついているため
一定以上の戦力を持つ者のみが調査を許される
MsgEn:
Located in the southern part of Bloodbane Isle,
there is a cave that has been discovered by the
scouts.
It has been confirmed that the Infected
Gorecyclops have made this place their lair.
Due to the presence of various other creatures,
possibly attracted by the leftovers, only those
with a certain level of strength are allowed to
conduct investigations.

MsgJp:
魔赤島の自然洞窟
地盤が一部落ち窪んだようになっており
天井部分から青空が見える箇所もある
陽光が差し込む様は幻想的で美しい光景だが
内部は侵食魔が跋扈し、多数の菌胞も確認されている
MsgEn:
The natural caves of Bloodbane Isle have
partially sunken and concave terrain, with some
areas where the ceiling reveals the blue sky.
The sunlight shining through creates a
fantastical and beautiful scene, but the interior
is infested with corruption, with numerous fungal
spores confirmed as well.

MsgJp:
魔赤島中央部の海岸を辿った先に入口が発見された
地下施設。内部では水のせせらぎが絶えず響き
神聖さを感じさせる造りになっていることから
聖堂であると判断された。彫刻などの人工物が多数
残されており、異郷の文化を感じることができる
MsgEn:
An entrance was discovered at the coast in the
central part of Bloodbane Isle.
Inside the underground facility, the sound of
flowing water constantly echoes, giving a sense of
holiness.
It was determined to be a sanctuary due to its
construction.
Many artificial objects, such as sculptures, have
been left behind, allowing one to experience a
foreign culture.

MsgJp:
魔赤島に唯一存在する塔《聖遺の塔》の傍にある
枯れ井戸。長らく人の手が入らなかったようで
井戸蓋が錆び付いており、中々内部の様子を
探ることができなかった
MsgEn:
Next to the Tower of the Holy Relics, the only
tower that exists on Bloodbane Isle, there is a
dried-up well. It seems that no one has touched it
for a long time, as the well cover is rusted and
it is difficult to examine the interior.

MsgJp:
<COL ffdc78>【竜力】の扉あり</COL>
《侵食魔の巣窟》のさらに奥に存在する空間
侵食魔は日光を避ける傾向にあることが判明
しているため、光の届かない内部にはさらに
侵食の進んだ魔物が潜んでいる可能性がある
MsgEn:
<COL ffdc78>【Dragon Force】Door</COL>
A space that exists further inside the Infected
Den.
It has been determined that the Infected
creatures tend to avoid sunlight.
Therefore, there is a possibility that further
inside the area where light does not reach, there
are more infected enemies lurking.

MsgJp:
<COL ffdc78>【竜力】の扉あり</COL>
魔赤島の絶崖側と山頂側を繋ぐ橋の付近にある坑道
橋から見える滝の裏側に、ひっそりと隠れるように
存在していたため、発見と初期調査が遅れた
MsgEn:
<COL ffdc78>【Dragon Force】Door</COL>
There is a tunnel near the bridge that connects
the cliff side and the summit side of Bloodbane
Isle.
It was hidden quietly on the back of the
waterfall visible from the bridge, which caused
the discovery and initial investigation to be
delayed.

MsgJp:
《異邦の岬》の一部から崖下に降りた先に発見
された洞窟。内部からは激しい水音が響き
通常の洞窟と比べてはるかに大量の水を湛えた
洞窟であることが確認されている
MsgEn:
Discovered at the bottom of the cliff after
descending from a part of the "Foreign Cape," a
cave where intense water sounds resonate inside
has been confirmed to hold a significantly larger
amount of water compared to a typical cave.

MsgJp:
魔赤島・絶崖側の西端に見つかった洞窟
入口付近にも大きく成長した菌胞が張り付き
内部の侵食が激しく進んでいることが一目見て
わかるほどになっている。危機に対処可能な
実力を持つと認められた者のみが調査を許される
MsgEn:
Cave found on the western edge of Bloodbane Isle
Precipice, known for its intense corruption and
infected fungal growth covering the entrance. Only
those recognized as having the ability to handle
the crisis are permitted to investigate it.

MsgJp:
<COL ffdc78>【竜力】の扉あり</COL>
魔赤島・絶崖側に発見された小聖堂
入口の扉は開閉されるごとに施錠される仕組みと
なっており、特殊な鍵を用いることでしか
開くことができない
MsgEn:
<COL ffdc78>【Dragon Force】Door</COL>
A small chapel discovered on the Bloodbane Isle -
Cliffside.
The entrance door is equipped with a locking
mechanism that locks every time it is opened and
closed, and can only be opened by using a special
key.

MsgJp:
魔赤島中央部にそびえる海を臨む小塔
外壁の様子から、かなり古くも丁寧に手入れをされ
てきたことがうかがえる。用途は不明だが、すぐ傍に
井戸があることから塔内部あるいはその地下にも水が
流れている可能性がある
MsgEn:
A small tower overlooks the sea towering in the
central part of Bloodbane Isle.
From the appearance of the outer wall, it can be
inferred that it has been quite old but carefully
maintained.
The purpose is unknown, but there is a well
nearby, suggesting that there may be water inside
the tower or underground.

MsgJp: 支援品のランクアップ

フィンダムの中でも特に自然の美しさに恵まれた水林
大半の水がエランより湧き出でているとされており
良質な水を守るために周辺の森林についても厳重に
管理されている
MsgEn:
In Phindym, the water forest is particularly
blessed with natural beauty.
Most of its water is said to spring forth from
Elan, and to protect the high-quality water,
the surrounding forests are carefully managed.

MsgJp:
エラン水林を管理するために設えられた科学者の住居
元は恵まれた環境を保全するという側面が強かったが
現在は侵食の被害をいかに食い止めるかという点に
研究の重点が置かれているようだ
MsgEn:
The residence of scientists established to manage
the Elan Water Grove.
Initially, the emphasis was on preserving the
rich environment, but now the focus of research
seems to be on how to halt the spread of
corruption and damage caused by it.

MsgJp:
ピクシーたちが棲みついていた場所だが
何らかの魔物の襲撃を受けたらしく
数日に渡り、ピクシーたちの騒ぎ声が
周辺に響いていたという。結局のところ
ピクシーたちは一匹残らず逃げ出したようだ
MsgEn:
The place where the Pixies were residing seems to
have been attacked by some kind of enemy.
For several days, the Pixies' restless voices
echoed in the surroundings.
In the end, it appears that all the Pixies fled.

MsgJp:
川へ降りられるなだらかな坂を有する川辺
一見、水を汲むために最適な場所かと思えるが
水獣が這い上がってくるのにもうってつけの
地形であり、周辺のくさむらを歩く際は
くれぐれも注意が必要
MsgEn:
Riverbank with a gentle slope that leads down to
the river.
At first glance, it may seem like the perfect
place to fetch water.
However, it is a terrain that is ideal for water
animals crawling up, so please be careful when
walking through the surrounding grasslands.

MsgJp:
エラン水林西部にあるワーグの住み処
戦士たちが力を合わせて何度もワーグの
撃退を試みているが、しばらくすると
この場に群れが舞い戻ってきてしまうという
MsgEn:
Warg dwelling place in the western part of the
Elan Water Grove.
The soldiers have been trying repeatedly to repel
the Warg, but shortly after, the creatures return
to this location in flocks.

MsgJp:
エラン水林の奥、紫色の花が群生する場所
ほのかに甘い香りが漂うため、花を摘もうと
この場を訪れる者は多い。しかし、芳香に
惹かれるのは人だけではないため、魔物と遭遇
してしまうという不運に見舞われることもある
MsgEn:
In the depths of Elan Water Grove, there is a
place where purple flowers bloom in abundance.
Many people visit this place with the intention
of picking the flowers, as a faint sweet fragrance
fills the air.
However, not only humans are drawn to this
wonderful scent, but also monsters.
Thus, the unfortunate could encounter them.

MsgJp:
エラン水林西部、滝の傍にある高台
有翼の魔物の住み処となっていて常に羽音が
絶えない。周辺は草花の群生地にもなっており
鳥に花にと、遠目に見るだけであれば美しい
光景が広がる
MsgEn:
The high ground in the western part of the Elan
Water Grove by the waterfall is the home of winged
demons and the sound of their wings is always
constant.
The surrounding area is also home to a cluster of
flowers and grasses and is beautiful if only seen
from a distance, with birds, flowers, and other
beautiful sights.

MsgJp:
エラン水林地域にある廃村跡地
住人が魔物の襲撃を受け、全滅して久しい
全滅に至った詳しい経緯は伝わっておらず
いまや忘れ去られた場である
MsgEn:
In the Elan Water Grove, there is a deserted
village that has long been destroyed by an enemy
attack.
The detailed circumstances that led to the
complete annihilation remain unknown, and now it
is a forgotten place.

MsgJp:
《<SPOT 931>》の傍にある、大きな滝に
面した広場。地名の由来は滝に虹がかかる
ことからという説の他に、色鮮やかな鳥達が
辺りを舞うからだという説もある
MsgEn:
A plaza facing a large waterfall beside<SPOT
931>.
The origin of the name of the place is said to be
the rainbow over the waterfall as well as the
brightly colored birds dancing around the area.

MsgJp:
《旧船頭寄合所》の周辺、木々に囲まれた川辺
美しい木漏れ日が差す中、エランの美しい川や
流れ落ちる滝を眺めることができる
MsgEn:
Surrounded by trees, near the "Old Ferryman's
Haunt", one can admire the beauty of the Elan
River, with its beautiful sunlight filtering
through the leaves, and the sight of cascading
waterfalls.

MsgJp:
エラン水林とファーラナ平原を繋ぐ
経路上にある大きな門。以前は簡単な
検問所を備え、エラン水林へ立ち入る
旅人の数を管理していた
MsgEn:
A grand gate stands on the route that connects
Elan Water Grove and Farana Plains.
It used to have a simple checkpoint to manage the
number of travelers entering Elan Water Grove.

MsgJp:
《エラン大門》の門前広場
大門が閉ざされるまでは、この場は
商人や旅人で賑わっていた
簡単な造りの店舗もいくつかあったが
いまや骨組を残すばかりである
MsgEn:
In front of the Elan Front Gate Plaza.
Until the gate was closed, his place was bustling
with merchants and travelers.
There were several simple shops, but now only the
framework remains.

MsgJp:
モロー樹林地域とエラン水林地域を跨ぐ洞窟
距離としてはそう長い洞窟ではないが
野狼が潜んでいることが多いため
通行時には多少の注意が必要である
MsgEn:
Cave spanning both the Morrow Forest and Elan
Water Grove.
It is not a particularly long cave in terms of
distance.
However, since wild wolves often lurk inside,
some caution is required when passing through.

MsgJp:
<COL ffdc78>【財宝】の扉あり</COL>
エラン水林西部にある自然洞窟
陽光の差し込む場所がいくつかあり、小さな虹が舞う
ような幻想的な光景が見られることがあるという
かつては周辺住人にも親しまれた場所であった
MsgEn:
<COL ffdc78> 【Treasure】Door</COL>
A natural cave located in the western part of
Elan Water Grove.
There are several places where sunlight filters
through, creating a fantastical scene with small
rainbows dancing in the air. This place used to be
beloved by the local residents.

MsgJp:
荒れ果てた《忘却の廃村》にのこる枯れ井戸
かつて魔物の襲撃を受けた村人たちが逃げ込んだと
いう井戸。村人たちのその後については様々な逸話が
残るが、一人残らず井戸の奥底に潜んでいた別種の
魔物の餌食となったという説が有力である
MsgEn:
In the "Forgotten Abandoned Village" that has
been left in ruins, an dried up well remains.
It is said that the villagers who once fled from
the attack of monsters sought refuge in this well.
There are various tales about what happened to
the villagers afterwards, but the theory that they
all became prey to a different kind of monster
lurking at the bottom of the well is the most
plausible one.

MsgJp:
聖域から降りてきた魔物が棲むと伝えられる
鍾乳洞。入り組んだ構造から奥へ進む者は
おらず、どのような魔物が巣食っているのかは
謎に包まれたままとなっている
MsgEn:
It is said that monsters that have descended from
the sacred grounds inhabit the limestone cave.
No one has ventured further into its intricate
structure, leaving the question of what kind of
enemy lurks there shrouded in mystery.

MsgJp:
<COL ffdc78>【昌石】の扉あり</COL>
元は船頭たちが休憩所として使っていた洞窟
居心地が良く、動物も訪れる癒しの場であったが
それゆえに獲物を求めた魔物に狙われることとなり
現在は魔物に乗っ取られた状態にある
MsgEn:
<COL ffdc78>【Gemstone Door】</COL>
Originally a cave used by boatmen as a resting
place, it was a soothing place where even animals
visited.
However, it became the target of monsters seeking
prey, and it is currently under the control of
these monsters.

MsgJp:
中規模の採石場として使われていた洞窟
魔物が侵入し、作業中の人員が襲われるという
悲劇が起きた。命からがら逃げだした者はすぐに
洞窟を封鎖したが、その時まだ中からは助けを
求める声が響いていたという
MsgEn:
The cave, which was used as a medium-sized
quarry, was invaded by enemies that tragically
attacked the workers.
The survivors quickly sealed off the cave, but at
that time, cries for help could still be heard
from inside.

MsgJp: 支援品のランクアップ

フィンダム大陸中部に広がる平原
起伏が多いフィンダムにおいて、ファーラナ平原は
なだらかで活用しやすい地形をしている
また、他の地域と比較すると侵食の度合は
緩やかなようで侵食魔の数も少ない
MsgEn:
The Farana Plains, located in the central part of
the Phindym continent, are characterized by gently
rolling terrain, making them easy to utilize in
the varied landscape of Phindym.
Furthermore, compared to other regions, the level
of corruption is relatively low, resulting in
fewer corrupted creatures.

MsgJp:
フィンダム大陸の中央部
精霊竜がねぐらとしている《芯なる樹》が
青々と生い茂る様は、フィンダム大陸の
どの拠点からでも眺めることができる
人々はその壮大さに確かな加護を感じて過ごしていた
MsgEn:
In the central part of the Phindym continent, the
Spirit Dragon's habitat, the "Core Tree", thrives
with lush greenery, which can be observed from any
stronghold in Phindym.
People feel a definite blessing in its grandeur
as they go about their lives.

MsgJp:
ファーラナ平原に位置する戦士の村
武勇を最も尊ぶ部族が住まい、住人たちは
日々鍛錬と戦いに明け暮れている
力に裏付けされてか、地理的な理由に寄るものか
比較的侵食の影響を受けずに生活している
MsgEn:
A village of warriors located in the Farana
Plains.
The inhabitants, who hold valor in the highest
regard, spend their days immersed in training and
battles.
Whether supported by their strength or due to
geographical reasons, they live relatively
unaffected by corruption.

MsgJp:
ダナの村の近くに佇む庵
《スピリットランサー》のジョブマスターである
勇壮な槍士アデルドナハが住んでいる
見込みのある者に対しては、自身のもつ
技術を伝授することもあるという
MsgEn:
Near Dana Village stands a hermitage, where the
brave Job Master of the Spirit Lancers, Adair
Donnchadh, resides.
It is said that he also imparts his skills to
promising individuals.

MsgJp:
ファーラナ平原の片隅、大岩の割れ目に
隠れるようにして作られた小さな集落
一切の外部との交流を断った結果、非常に独特な
文化を形成するにいたった一族が住んでいる
MsgEn:
In a corner of the Farana Plains, in a crack in a
large rock, there lives a small hidden settlement
inhabited by a tribe that has developed a very
unique culture as a result of refusing all contact
with the outside world.

MsgJp:
精霊竜が棲む《始まりの洞》下層に位置する拠点
精霊竜の守りをする者たちや訪れた人々が
暫しの休息を得るための場となっている
MsgEn:
Base camp located in the lower level of the
Hollow of Beginnings, where the Spirit Dragon
resides.
It serves as a place for the protectors of the
Spirit Dragon and for those who have visited to
find temporary rest and respite.

MsgJp:
《芯なる樹》の最深部
侵食による影響が出るまでは、精霊竜との
謁見などはこの場所で行われていた
精霊竜の守りとして選ばれた者たちが控えていた
集いの間と隣接している
MsgEn:
The deepest part of the "Core Tree".
Until the effects of corruption took hold,
meetings with the Spirit Dragon were held in this
location.
Those chosen as guardians of the Spirit Dragon
awaited in the adjacent Gathering Hall.

MsgJp:
ファーラナ平原にぽつりと佇む住居の遺跡
古くはこの場所にダナの村があったのだが
拓けた場という防御面の弱さが問題視され
地形が入り組み敵の進入を妨げる現在の
場に移り住んだ
MsgEn:
In the Farana Plains, stands the ruins of a
dwelling, all by itself.
Long ago, there was a village called Dana in this
place.
However, the vulnerability of this wide-open area
in terms of defense was seen as an issue.
So they moved to the current location, where the
terrain is intricate and hinders enemy
infiltration.

MsgJp:
ファーラナ遺跡の周辺にある円形遺跡
在りし日は戦士たちが武を競う闘技場として
使用されていたらしいが、当時の柱などは
ほとんど倒壊してしまっているため
現在は特に注目されることもない
MsgEn:
The circular ruins near the Farana Ruins.
Used to be a battlefield where warriors competed,
but most of the columns from that time have
collapsed, so there is currently no particular
attention given to it.

MsgJp:
ファーラナ平原の山肌にあるニュートの巣穴
そう深さは無く、食糧を貯蓄している様子も無いので
恐らく休息を得る目的で作られたのだろう
見張りを立てて交替で使用しているのか、入口
付近では常にニュートが目を光らせている
MsgEn:
On the mountainside of the Farana Plains, there
is a Newt Den.
It doesn't appear to be very deep, and there
doesn't seem to be any stored food, so it was
probably made for the purpose of resting.
Near the entrance, the Newts always keep watch,
taking turns to stand guard.

MsgJp:
ファーラナ平原の《マグサス古水路》入口付近、岩が
立ち並ぶ周辺。巨大な岩が数個露出している以外は
特に目立つものも無い場所であるが、鎧の擦れる音が
聞こえたり、視界の端に巨大な剣が見えたという
報告が絶えない
MsgEn:
Near the entrance of Magusas Ancient Watercourse
in the Farana Plains, there is a surrounding area
with rocks scattered about.
Other than a few exposed giant rocks, there is
nothing particularly noticeable about this place.
However, there are constant reports of hearing
the sound of armor scraping and seeing a giant
sword at the edge of one's field of vision.

MsgJp:
ファーラナ平原奥地にある湿地帯
霧が発生しやすく視界が悪いことが多い
甲竜が棲息しており、目を凝らせば霧の
奥でゆっくりと動く巨影を確認することができる
MsgEn:
In the depths of the Farana Plains, there is a
marshland where mist often forms, making
visibility poor.
Beasts known as "Shell Dragons" reside there, and
if you focus your eyes, you can confirm the
slow-moving silhouette deep within the mist.

MsgJp:
ファーラナ平原とエラン水林を繋ぐ谷あい
の道、中ほどにある少し拓けた場所
周囲を崖に囲まれているため、大型の魔物が
身を隠して羽根を休めるための巣として
利用している
MsgEn:
A slightly open place in the middle of the road
connecting the Farana Plains and the Elan Water
Grove.
The surrounding cliffs make it a nest for large
monsters to hide and rest their wings.

MsgJp:
ファーラナ平原の川中に浮かぶ陸地
周辺は水深が浅く、水没してはいるものの
歩き回ることが可能。ただし、汚泥が流れ着く
ことも多いらしく、不浄の魔物がさ迷っている
こともある
MsgEn:
A piece of land floating in the middle of the
river in the Farana Plains.
The surrounding waters are shallow, allowing for
exploration on foot, despite periodic submersion.
However, it appears that mud and debris often
accumulate here, leading to the presence of foul
creatures wandering about.

MsgJp:
戦士の村であるダナ付近にある廟堂
ダナには、自らの武勇の証を立てるため
この廟堂に巣食う魔物を倒してみせるという
文化が存在する。ただし、かつては頻繁に行われて
いたらしいが、現代において使用されることはごく稀
MsgEn:
There is a shrine near the village of warriors,
called Dana.
In order to prove their bravery, there is a
cultural tradition of defeating the monsters that
inhabit this shrine.
However, it is very rare for this tradition to be
practiced in modern times.

MsgJp:
古代に住居として使用されていたらしき洞窟
最近はピクシーが棲みつき、人間が足を
踏み入れることは難しい状況にある。奥は猛獣が
縄張りとしているとの情報もあったが
ピクシーたちが必死に通路を塞いだようだ
MsgEn:
It appears that this cave was once used as a
dwelling in ancient times.
Recently, it has been inhabited by pixies, making
it difficult for humans to enter.
There is also information that there are fierce
animals deep inside, but it seems that the pixies
have desperately blocked the passage.

MsgJp:
<COL ffdc78>【昌石】の扉あり</COL>
ファーラナ平原中で最大規模の遺跡
多少崩壊している箇所もあるが全体の作りは堅固
であり、魔物に侵入されるまでは過去の貴重な
文献などを保管する書庫として活用されてきた
MsgEn:
<COL ffdc78>【Gemstone】 Door</COL>
The largest archaeological site in the Farana
Plains, with some areas showing signs of collapse,
but the overall structure is solid.
It was once used as a repository for valuable
historical documents, storing them until it was
invaded by enemies.

MsgJp:
古将マグサスを始めとした歴戦の猛者たちが
眠る墓所。水路も兼ねていたが、いつの頃からか
ウィルムが棲みつき、慰霊のために訪れる者は
いなくなった。まれに、副葬品狙いの墓荒らしが
命知らずにも入り込むことがあるらしい
MsgEn:
The resting place of seasoned warriors, including
the ancient hero Magusas.
While also serving as a waterway, it has been
inhabited by a Wyrm for quite some time now, and
those who used to visit to pay their respects have
disappeared.
Occasionally, grave robbers, driven by the desire
for burial artifacts, dare to venture in
unknowingly.

MsgJp:
芯なる樹と聖塔が融合した《始まりの洞》内部
へと続く回廊。塔自体は数千年前から存在する
ものであるが、芯なる樹に支えられていることで
非常に良い状態で保たれている
MsgEn:
Corridor leading to the Hollow of Beginnings,
where the Core Tree and the Holy Tower have
merged. Although the tower itself has been in
existence for thousands of years, it is kept in
very good condition thanks to the support of the
Core Tree.

MsgJp:
《精霊竜のねぐら》へと続くらせん状の階段を
有した空間。空気中に満ちた竜力の加護か、
これだけの長い階段を上ってもまるで足の痛みを
感じることが無いという
MsgEn:
A spiraling staircase leading to the "Spirit
Dragon's Roost."
Perhaps due to the divine protection of the
Dragon Force permeating the air, one can ascend
this long staircase without feeling any pain in
their feet.

MsgJp:
<COL ffdc78>【財宝】の扉あり</COL>
大量の水を湛えた自然の地下洞窟を元に作られた
集水路。今まで水が枯れたことは無く、手入れが
必要無かったことから最低限しか手が入れられて
いない。最近は水竜が棲みついているとの噂もある
MsgEn:
<COL ffdc78>[Treasure] Door</COL>
A canal that was built based on a natural
underground cave filled with a large amount of
water.
The water has never dried up before and minimal
maintenance has been carried out because it has
not been necessary.
There have been rumors recently that water
dragons have made it their habitat.

MsgJp:
精霊竜が棲む、《芯なる樹》の頂上部
フィンダム大陸中で最も竜力に満ちた
清浄な空間であったが、精霊竜が毒に
侵されたことにより、苦痛と禍々しさに
溢れる場所となった
MsgEn:
At the top of the "Core Tree," where the "Spirit
Dragon" resides.
The place most filled with "Dragon Force" in the
entire continent of Phindym.
It was once a pure space, but due to the Spirit
Dragon being tainted by poison, it has become a
place filled with pain and malevolence.

MsgJp:
《芯なる樹》の太い根が伸び、聖域の影響が
色濃く出た遺跡。入口が崩落してはいるが
そのせいもあってか人が入った形跡は最小限に
保たれている
MsgEn:
The thick roots of the "Core Tree" stretch out,
and the influence of the Sacred Grounds is
strongly felt.
Although the entrance has collapsed, and perhaps
because of that, there are minimal signs of anyone
entering.

MsgJp:
かつてはフィンダム中から学者たちが集う学研の場で
あった小塔。魔物の襲撃を受けて放棄されたのち
ピクシーの大きな群れが移住した。位の高い
ピクシーは高所を好むため、小塔の上階には群れ
の長もしくは準ずる個体が生息していると思われる
MsgEn:
A small tower in the midst of Phindym, where
scholars gathered in the past.
After being abandoned due to enemy raids, a large
group of Pixies migrated there.
Pixies of high rank prefer high places, so it is
believed that the leader or a similar individual
of the group resides on the upper floor of the
tower.

MsgJp:
ファーラナ平原の少し奥まった高台に建つ小塔
以前は代々内部で暮らす者たちがいたものの
彼らは二百年近く前に突然塔から出てダナ村に
合流したという。それ以来、たまに掃除に訪れる
者がいる程度で普段は無人となっている
MsgEn:
On a slightly secluded hill in Farana Plains,
there is a small tower.
Previously, there were people living inside for
generations.
However, about two hundred years ago, they
suddenly left the tower and joined Dana Village.
Since then, it has been uninhabited, with only
occasional visitors for cleaning.

MsgJp: 支援品のランクアップ

フィンダム随一の森林地帯
樹木や草花、多様な獣といった森の恩恵を
受けられるこの地の特性は、反面侵食の影響が
最も色濃く発現する悲劇を招いた。生命力に
溢れていた森は今や赤く立ち枯れている箇所が目立つ
MsgEn:
The premier woodland region of Phindym, where one
can enjoy the benefits of the forest, including
trees, flowers, and a variety of animals.
However, the characteristic of this land also
brings about the tragic manifestation of the most
intense corruption and infection.
The once vibrant forest now stands with prominent
red decay.

MsgJp:
モロー樹林にある、木々に囲まれた村
代々精霊竜の守りをしてきた一族が住まう
そのせいか理知的な者が多く、学者を多数
輩出してきた。威厳ある族長・ガラダに
よって統治されている
MsgEn:
In the Morrow Forest, there is a village
surrounded by trees, where a clan that has been
guarding the Spirit Dragon for generations
resides.
Perhaps because of this, there are many
intellectual individuals, and they have produced
numerous scholars.
They are ruled by the dignified chieftain,
Gearóid.

MsgJp:
モルフォール周辺にある巨岩群
いずれかの巨岩の下に高名な賢者ティルカンが
眠ると言われている。残念ながら、墓となる岩を
特定するための情報は失われている
MsgEn:
A group of giant rocks in the vicinity of
Morfaul.
It is said that a renowned sage named Tilkan
sleeps under one of the rocks.
Unfortunately, the information to identify the
specific rock that serves as his grave is lost.

MsgJp:
モロー樹林西部にある、ゴブリンが小さな群れを
形成して潜んでいた一帯。この小さな群れは
あまり攻撃性が高くなかったとみられ、ひっそりと
森の奥で暮らしていたらしい。しかし、今は侵食に
よって凶暴になってしまっているため注意が必要
MsgEn:
In the Morrow Forest in the west, a small group
of Goblins has formed and hidden.
This small group appeared to have low
aggressiveness and quietly lived deep in the
forest.
However, they have become dangerously aggressive
due to corruption, so caution is necessary.

MsgJp:
《モローケイヴァン》入口付近の木立
この辺りの土壌、木々は侵食が進むあまり
もはや目を覆いたくなるような状況である
緑豊かだった木々は今や立ち枯れ、菌糸体を
まとって赤くひび割れてすらいる
MsgEn:
Near the entrance of Morrow Cavern, the
surrounding grove is in such a state of corruption
and infected that it becomes unbearable to look
at.
The once lush trees are now standing dead,
covered in reddened cracks and even infected with
mycelium.

MsgJp:
モルフォールの裏手にあるピクシーたちの野営地
家畜や農作物をこっそり盗むのが元々の目的だった
のだろうが、侵食されたピクシーたちには最早
そういった知性は無く、恐らく侵食前の習慣に従い
辺りをうろついているのだと推測されている
MsgEn:
Camp of Pixies behind Morfaul.
Originally, their purpose was to secretly steal
livestock and crops.
However, the Pixies who have been corrupted no
longer possess such intelligence, and it is
speculated that they are simply wandering around
based on their habits before corruption.

MsgJp:
以前は人が暮らす小さな拠点として機能していたが
侵食魔に脅かされた住人たちは土地を捨てて
逃げることを選び、現在は魔物が闊歩するのみ
となっている
MsgEn:
It used to function as a small hub of human
habitation, but threatened by the invading demons,
the residents chose to abandon their land and
flee, and now it is only a place where demons
roam.

MsgJp:
モロー樹林地域に現存する唯一の遺跡
大変古い小神殿の遺跡だと思われるが
殆ど倒壊しており痕跡が確認できるのみである
また、周囲には魔物が棲みつき始めたため
いよいよ誰も近寄らない場所となってしまった
MsgEn:
Translation: It is believed to be the only
remaining ruins in the Morrow Forest region.
Though it appears to be the remnants of a very
ancient shrine, it has mostly collapsed and only
traces can be observed. Furthermore, due to the
presence of enemy creatures in the vicinity, it
has become a place that nobody dares to approach
anymore.

MsgJp:
<SPOT 964>にある木立
土壌の侵食が進み、木々も草花も
立ったままの姿で色褪せ、枯れかかっている
辺りに住んでいた小型の魔物たちも
残らず侵食が進んだ状態となっている
MsgEn:
At <SPOT 964>, the surrounding trees are fading
away and withering, with the soil being corrupted.
Even the small creatures that once inhabited the
area have been completely infected.

MsgJp:
<SPOT 964>に位置する窪地
青い芝に覆われた小動物の住み処は、いまや
剥き出しの土の上に不気味な菌糸体を
はびこらせている。広々とした地形は大型の
魔物が巣食いやすく危険である
MsgEn:
Located at <SPOT 964>, this depression which was
once covered in green grass, is now overrun with
eerie mycelium spread across the exposed earth.
The spacious terrain makes it dangerous and a
suitable nest for large monsters.

MsgJp:
《ノーザナス侵林》入口のある崖の下に
広がる平地。封鎖されている侵林に
引き寄せられているのか、侵食が進んだ
有翼の魔物たちがしきりにこの辺りを
さまよう姿が確認されている
MsgEn:
A flat area of land spreading out under the cliff
where the entrance to the Northerners Infected
Woods is
located.
It is confirmed that winged beasts, infected by
corruption, are frequently wandering around this
area.

MsgJp:
元はピクシーの群れが棲みついていた洞窟だったが
何らかの侵食魔の襲撃を受けたことがきっかけで
群れ全体に侵食が蔓延してしまったと推測される
侵食の度合から見て、ピクシーたちを襲った魔物は
洞窟の奥に潜んでいるらしい
MsgEn:
The original cave was once inhabited by a group
of Pixies, but it was attacked by some kind of
corrupted creature, causing the corruption to
spread throughout the entire group.
Based on the extent of the corruption, it is
speculated that the creature that attacked the
Pixies is lurking deep within the cave.

MsgJp:
<COL ffdc78>【竜力】の扉あり</COL>
元は採掘場として人でにぎわっていた洞窟
侵食による影響が発見されてからの進行がはやく
人々は採掘道具すら回収しきらぬままに撤退したが
情報が行きわたらず取り残された者もいた
MsgEn:
<COL ffdc78>[Dragon Force] Door</COL>
Originally, the cave was bustling with people as
a mining site.
However, the progress since the discovery of the
effects of corruption has been rapid.
People withdrew without even fully recovering
their mining tools, but there were some who were
left behind without receiving any information.

MsgJp:
モロー樹林北部、特に侵食が進んだ一帯にある
封鎖された森林。侵食前より森の強者が棲むとされ、
人が迷いこむことが無いようにと封鎖されていた場所
奥を確かめた者はいないが、凶暴な魔物が侵食された
状態にあることは確実であり、危険度は高い
MsgEn:
The sealed forest located in the northern part of
Morrow Forest, where corruption has particularly
advanced.
It is said to be inhabited by powerful beings of
the forest, and it was sealed off to prevent
people from getting lost.
No one has ventured deep inside, but it is
certain that ferocious monsters have been
infected. The level of danger is high.

MsgJp:
モロー樹林北西部にある封鎖された森林
小さな集落がある穏やかな森だったものの
侵食の度合が激しく、人々も集落を捨てて
逃げ出している。ピクシーたちが集まる小屋も
あったが、侵食に飲み込まれてしまった
MsgEn:
Sealed forest in the northwest of Morrow Forest.
It was once a peaceful forest with a small
village, but the level of corruption grew severe,
causing the people to abandon the village and
escape.
There was also a cabin where the pixies gathered,
but it too was swallowed up by the corruption.

MsgJp:
<COL ffdc78>【宝飾】の扉あり</COL>
モロー樹林北部に位置する封鎖された森林
グリフィンの飛来を理由に立ち入りを制限されていた
確認しに行った者はいないが、恐らくこの場にいた
グリフィンも侵食されてしまったものと思われる
MsgEn:
<COL ffdc78>Jewelry Door</COL>
A sealed forest located in the northern part of
Morrow Forest.
Access was restricted due to the arrival of a
griffin.
No one has confirmed it, but it is likely that
the griffin present in this area has also been
corrupted.

細長くうねった川と切り立った崖で構成された峡谷
古代からの遺跡が多くのこる地域であり、文化的に
重要な地帯である。この辺りに住む人々も、伝承や
習慣などを重視した生活を送る傾向にある
MsgEn:
An area composed of a narrow, winding river and
steep cliffs, forming a gorge.
It is a region with many ancient ruins remaining,
making it culturally significant.
The people living in this area tend to prioritize
traditions and customs in their way of life.

MsgJp:
キンガル峡谷に位置する村
近くに多数のこる遺跡や神殿などの古代文明に
畏怖の念を抱き、古くからの伝統や伝承などを
現在に伝え継いできた一族が住んでいる
村の掟として、村人が遺跡に近づくことを禁じている
MsgEn:
Village located in Kingal Canyon.
Nearby are numerous ancient ruins and temples
that belong to a long-lost civilization.
The villagers, who have lived here since ancient
times, hold a deep reverence for these sites and
their traditions and legends.
As a village rule, the villagers are forbidden
from approaching the ruins.

MsgJp:
キンガル峡谷北部に位置する小塔
通常の拠点ではなく塔の中で暮らすことを
選んだ一族が暮らしている。住人は独自の
文化を継承しているらしく、殆ど小塔の外に
出ないように生活している
MsgEn:
There is a small tower located in the northern
part of Kingal Canyon.
There, a clan has chosen to live inside the tower
instead of a regular settlement.
The residents seem to have inherited their own
culture and live their lives mostly without
venturing outside the tower.

MsgJp:
キンガル峡谷西部にある川岸
《芯なる樹》を非常に近くから眺められるほか
崖に近寄ることで、その根元を見ることすら
可能。ただし、現在は獣の死骸を目当てに
寄ってくる魔物に注意が必要である
MsgEn:
On the riverbank in the western part of Kingal
Canyon, you can admire the "Core Tree" from a very
close distance.
By approaching the cliffs, you can even see its
roots.
However, caution is necessary as there are
currently monsters that come near in search of
animal carcasses.

MsgJp:
グリンデュア対岸にあたる拓けた河岸
以前はこの河岸から河に出るための船が
出ていたが、ある頃から人や積み荷の
上げ降ろし中に魔物に襲われることが
増えたため、現在は使われていない
MsgEn:
On the opposite bank of Glyndwr, there is a wide
riverbank.
In the past, boats would leave from this bank to
go out onto the river.
However, at some point, the number of attacks by
enemies during the loading and unloading of people
and cargo increased, so the boats are no longer in
use.

MsgJp:
キンガル峡谷中央部、遠浅の川岸が続く一帯
この周囲は人が歩いて渡れるほどに浅い岸が
広がっている。また、魔物が食い散らかしたと
見られる魚や動物の死肉が大量に流れ着いており
風向きによっては悪臭が漂う日もあるようだ
MsgEn:
In the central part of Kingal Canyon, there is an
area where the riverbank is shallow enough for
people to walk across.
The surrounding area is extensive, with what
seems to be a large amount of dead fish and
animals that have been devoured by enemies.
Depending on the wind direction, there are days
when a foul smell lingers in the air.

MsgJp:
《シェドレアン大神殿》の門前にある広場
荘厳な神殿を臨むこの場に似合わず、辺りには
獣の死骸が散らばり、死臭が立ち込めている
魔族の影を見たという報告もあるため、通行時には
十分な警戒が必要である
MsgEn:
In front of the gate of the "Shadolean Great
Temple", there is a plaza.
Despite its majestic temple, there are animal
carcasses scattered around, and the stench of
death fills the air.
There have also been reports of sightings of
fiendish creatures, so caution is necessary when
passing through.

MsgJp:
グリンメル遺跡の近くにある川岸
以前は遺跡への参道だったが、土が水に削られてゆき
現在は完全に川の中に沈んでしまっている
見かけより水深はないため、子供でも歩いて
渡ることが可能である
MsgEn:
A riverside near the Grinmel Ruins.
It used to be a pathway to the ruins, but the
soil was eroded by water and now it has completely
sunk into the river.
Despite appearing treacherous, the water depth is
not significant, so even children can walk across
it.

MsgJp:
キンガル峡谷西部にある拠点跡地
この村が滅んだ理由は明らかになっていないが
周辺の状況から、局所的な飢饉に襲われ
抵抗する力が落ちていたところへ魔物の襲撃を受け
全滅したのではないかと言われている
MsgEn:
Village ruins located in the western part of
Kingal Canyon.
The reason for the village's demise is still
unclear, but it is said that it was attacked by
monsters when its resistance was weakened by a
localized famine.
It is believed that the village was completely
wiped out.

MsgJp:
元々はフィンダムの大地へ、そして竜のために季節
ごとの舞踊が奉納されていた広場。侵食によって
フィンダム全域での危険度が増したことでこれらの
行事は中止され、以来本来の使い方をされることは
無くなった
MsgEn:
A square originally dedicated to seasonal dances
dedicated to the dragon.
Due to the increase in danger throughout Phindym
caused by the Corruption, these events were
canceled and have since ceased to be used for
their original purpose.

MsgJp:
グリンデュア対岸に位置する古代神殿の遺跡
内部は活性化したデーモンが多数巣食っている
ところどころにそう古くはない書籍などが
散乱しているところから、最近まで何らかの
施設として利用されていた様子が垣間見える
MsgEn:
Situated across from Glyndwr, there are the
remains of an ancient temple.
The interior is inhabited by numerous active
demons.
Scattered throughout are relatively new books and
materials, indicating that it was recently used as
some kind of facility.

MsgJp:
<COL ffdc78>【宝飾】の扉あり</COL>
キンガル峡谷にある遺跡
当時の覚者を導いたとされる巫女が祀られている遺跡
周りを山脈に囲まれているせいか、元は大地を巡る
竜力の恩恵を受けやすい立地であった
MsgEn:
<COL ffdc78>【Jewelry】 Door</COL>
An Arisen is said to have been guided by a maiden
who is enshrined in the ruins of Kingal Canyon.
The ruins are surrounded by mountains, making it
a location that was easily influenced by the
blessings of Dragon Force, which once circulated
the land.

MsgJp:
キンガル峡谷に悠然と佇む古代神殿
数百年前に遺棄されたものの、当時満ち満ちていた
竜力によって未だ壮麗な姿をそのままにしている
遺棄された理由は、恐らく精霊竜自身が神殿よりも
《芯なる樹》の傍にあることを好んだためだろう
MsgEn:
Standing gracefully in the Kingal Canyon, the
ancient temple remains magnificent, even after
being abandoned hundreds of years ago.
It still retains its grandeur, thanks to the
Dragon Force that once thrived here.
The reason for its abandonment was likely because
the Spirit Dragon preferred to be near the "Core
Tree" rather than the temple itself.

MsgJp:
《イヴァノスの塔》付近にある大遺跡
倒壊はしているものの入口付近には飾柱も
多数のこっており、豪華な造りだったことが
うかがえる。壁面には何らかの呪印が刻まれて
いるらしく強い魔力の痕跡がある
MsgEn:
Near the "Tower of Ivanos" there is a large
ancient ruin.
Although it has collapsed, there are numerous
decorative columns near the entrance, suggesting
that it was once splendidly built.
The walls are engraved with some kind spell,
leaving traces of intense magic power.

MsgJp:
<COL ffdc78>【竜力】の扉あり</COL>
以前は旅商人たちが頻繁に利用していたらしいが
少し前からピクシーたちに乗っ取られた状態にある
奥へ行くほど侵食が進んでいるため、内部に
入り込もうとした者も途中で引き返してきたという
MsgEn:
<COL ffdc78>【Dragon Force】Door</COL>
It seems that in the past, it was frequently used
by traveling merchants, but for a while now, it
has been taken over by Pixies.
The further you go inside, the more the
corruption is apparent.
Those who tried to enter have turned back halfway.

MsgJp:
侵食が拡がっているほか、それ以前からも盗賊に
よってひどく荒らされた形跡が生々しく残る
活性化したデーモンが巣食っており、侵食によって
さらに凶暴化した状態で跋扈している
MsgEn:
The corruption is spreading, and there are clear
signs of extensive damage caused by bandits even
before that.
Demons have taken up residence and are rampaging
in a more aggressive state due to the corruption.

MsgJp:
多彩な獣が棲息し、アッカーシェランにおいて
国内有数の狩場となっている山麓
まっすぐに伸びる良質な木材にも恵まれており
近隣に棲む人々の多くは狩猟、もしくは林業で
生計を立てて暮らしている
MsgEn:
Various animals inhabit the foothills and it has
become one of the top hunting grounds in the
country.
The foothills are also blessed with high-quality
timber that stretches straight.
Many of the nearby residents make a living
through hunting or forestry.

MsgJp:
西部にはアッカーシェラン最大の湖《翡翠湖》が
広がっているのが最大の特徴。
その大きな湖からもたらされる恵みの一つが
大振りで上品な味の魚であり、地域の村や
集落には独自の魚料理が発達している
MsgEn:
In the western region, the largest lake in Acre
Selund, known as "Emerald Lake," spreads out,
which is its main feature of area. One of the
blessings brought by this large lake is the large
and elegant-tasting fish, which has led to the
development of unique fish cuisine in the local
villages and settlements.

MsgJp:
解放軍が拠点として使っている小さな集落
元はきこりが使っていたらしき空き家を中心に、
逃げ延びた人たちがテントを張って暮らしているが
いつオークに攻め込まれるかわからない状況にある
MsgEn:
The small settlement used as a base by the
Liberation Army.
It originally consisted of vacant houses,
seemingly once occupied by lumberjacks.
Now, people who managed to escape have pitched
tents and are living there, constantly facing the
uncertainty of when they will be attacked by Orcs.

MsgJp:
600年ほど前に建造された砦
アッカー家が並み居る地方豪族を倒して
大陸統一を果たした後に、対オーク用に強化されて
現在に至る。長く役目を果たしていたが“悪しき竜”
出現直後にオーク軍に占拠された
MsgEn:
A fort that was built about 600 years ago.
After the Acre family defeated the local feudal
lords, they strengthened it to fend off the Orcs
and it has remained that way to this day.
It had served its purpose for a long time, but
was occupied by the Orc army shortly after the
appearance of the "Evil Dragon."

MsgJp:
翡翠湖を臨む、長くロスギル家が治める地方の中心地
魔物が多い地帯ならではの重装家屋が見られる
王族アッカー家から一帯の守護を任されてきた
ロスギル家の末裔を長に頂き、忠誠心に篤い人々が
暮らしている
MsgEn:
Overlooking Emerald Lake, in the heart of a
region long ruled by the Rothgill family.
One can see the sturdy houses characteristic of
this land abundant in enemies.
Tasked with protecting the entire area by the
noble Acre family, descendants of the Rothgill
family serve as its leaders, with loyal and
devoted individuals living here.

MsgJp:
一部では“南の盗賊”と呼ばれる大盗賊ベルタ
率いる盗賊団の隠れ里。湖に流れ込む川に
よって浸食されてできた洞窟でもある
並の人間では辿り着くことができない場所に
あるといわれている
MsgEn:
A hidden village of a notorious bandit group led
by the great bandit Bertha, also known as the
"Bandit of the South."
It is said to be located in a cave formed by
erosion from a river that flows into the lake, in
a place that cannot be reached by ordinary people.

MsgJp:
隠れ村ピレモス付近にあるグリムゴブリンたちの
縄張り。見よう見まねで作ったらしき、オークや
人間の作るものに似た構造物が散見される
どうやらゴブリンたちもここを拠点とし
人間の動向を見張っているつもりのようだ
MsgEn:
The territory of the Grim Goblins near Hidden
Village Piremoth.
Structures resembling those made by orcs and
humans can be seen, apparently made by mimicking.
It seems that the goblins consider this place
their base and are keeping an eye on the movements
of humans.

MsgJp:
ロスギルにほど近い開けた高台
まだ拠点として使われている様子は
見られないが、魔狼たちがなわばりとして
警戒し続けていることから、ロスギルへ
攻め込む際の足掛かりとされる可能性がある
MsgEn:
An open plateau, not far from Rothgill.
Although it doesn't appear to be currently used
as a base, there is a possibility that it serves
as a stepping stone for an attack on Rothgill, as
the demon wolves continue to guard it
territorially.

MsgJp:
魔軍の襲撃により抵抗虚しく潰えた村
周囲の小さな集落を繋ぐ役割を果たしていた中心的な
山村だったが、それ故に早期に魔軍の襲撃を受けた
建物は一つ残らず破壊され、放たれた火が未だ燻り
続ける様には生々しい痛ましさが漂う
MsgEn:
The village, which served as the central mountain
village connecting the surrounding small
settlements, was completely crushed by the raid of
the Demon Army.
Every building was destroyed without exception,
and the lingering fire still smolders, carrying a
raw and painful sensation.

MsgJp:
解放軍が休憩をとるために設営した小さな小屋
オークたちの襲撃を受けた際に母屋以外は全て
破壊されてしまった。そればかりか、現在は
魔軍が利用している形跡すらみられる
MsgEn:
The small hut set up by the Liberation Army for
rest was completely destroyed during the Orc
attack, except for the main house.
Not only that, but there are even signs that the
Demon Army is currently using it.

MsgJp:
魔軍が休息地として利用している岩洞
入口からは想像がつかないほど大きく開けた内部
空間は一見休むに最適かと思えるが、じめじめと
しており、スライムなども発生しやすい。魔物ならば
いざ知らず人間はここで休む気にはなれないだろう
MsgEn:
The demon army is using the cave as a resting
place.
The interior, which is much larger than one would
imagine from the entrance, seems like an ideal
place to rest at first glance. However, it is damp
and prone to slime and other creatures.
While demons may not mind, humans would not feel
inclined to rest here.

MsgJp:
関所を守るように魔軍の大隊が留まっている拠点
設置された多数の大砲は解放軍の戦力を大幅に削いだ
運良く砲弾を逃れた兵もいたようだが、敵陣の
中で寡兵での戦いを強いられることとなったのは
寧ろ悲劇であった
MsgEn:
The demon army's battalion is stationed at the
stronghold, as if guarding a checkpoint.
The numerous cannons that were set up
significantly depleted the liberation army's
forces.
Some fortunate soldiers managed to dodge the
cannonballs, but they were forced into a battle
with few troops within enemy lines.
It was a tragedy.

MsgJp:
魔軍戦車《カトブレパス》が留められている広場
巨大且つ凶暴、全てを踏み砕きながら進む
カトブレパスだが、魔軍はそれをさらに武装させた
ものを“戦車”として使役している
MsgEn:
The plaza where the demon army's tank,
Catoblepas, is stationed.
Gigantic and fierce, it crushes everything in its
path.
The demon army has further armed and prepared it
as a "tank" for their use.

MsgJp:
他の拠点とは異なり、施設や柵の類が極端に少ない
魔軍拠点。何らかの理由で本来意図しなかった
場所に拠点を急造しなければならなかったのか、
あるいは柵を立てられない状況にあったのかは
偵察からの情報だけでは判断できない
MsgEn:
Unlike other bases, this Demon Army stronghold
has extremely few facilities and fences.
It is unclear whether the base had to be hastily
constructed in an unintended location due to some
reason, or if they were unable to erect fences in
their current situation.
This cannot be determined based solely on
reconnaissance information.

MsgJp:
オーク軍の将軍《獣の将》が支配する魔獣を
放している危険な区画が発見された
うろついている魔獣は獣の将が特に気に入って
いる個体であるとも、強化実験のために何らかの
特別な処理を施された個体だとも推測されている
MsgEn:
A dangerous zone where the Beast Master of the
Orc army controls the beasts has been discovered.
It is speculated that the roaming demon beasts
are individuals that the Beast Master particularly
favors or individuals that have undergone some
special treatment for strengthening experiments.

MsgJp:
一見よくある洞窟だが高低差が激しい
箇所があったり、より奥へ進んだ者がことごとく
戻らなかったという経緯から、近辺で育った
者はこの洞穴に近寄らないよう厳しく教え
込まれるという
MsgEn:
At first glance, it appears to be a typical cave,
but there are steep variations in height, and
those who venture further inside never return.
People who grew up in the vicinity are strictly
instructed not to approach this cave.

MsgJp:
廃村デニスィルの裏手にある古い地下水路
魔軍のオークが見張りについていることから
内部に何かが隠されているか、あるいは重要な
通路の一つとして見なされていると推測される
また、ティネス砦に繋がっているという説もある
MsgEn:
Behind the deserted village of Denisyr, there is
an old underground waterway.
The fact that orc soldiers from the Demon Army
are stationed there suggests that something is
hidden inside or that it is considered an
important passage.
There is also a theory that it connects to Fort
Thines.

MsgJp:
野生動物が棲みついている洞窟
特にめぼしい資源があるわけでもない場所
だったが、なぜか近年にわかに「奥に宝物が
隠されている」という噂が流れた
MsgEn:
The cave where wild animals reside is not
particularly known for any valuable resources.
However, for some reason, a rumor has recently
spread saying that treasure is hidden deep within.

MsgJp:
ダクレイム砦付近にある岩山の中に造られた遺跡
砦の付近という格好の場所にあるため、魔軍・人間
両勢力がこの遺跡を拠点として利用しようとしたが
共に最深部まで辿り着くことはできなかった
誰一人として生還者がいないため、その原因も不明
MsgEn:
Ruins built inside a rocky mountain near Dacreim
Fortress.
It was a prime location, so both the Demon Army
and the humans tried to use this ruin as their
base.
However, neither of them were able to reach the
deepest part.
There were no survivors, and the cause is also
unknown.

MsgJp:
ベルタ盗賊団のアジト近くに流れる地下水路
武装した魔獣が徘徊しているが、それを御す
オークの姿は確認されていない。盗賊団の
アジトを探すために放たれた魔獣が迷い込み、
そのまま帰還せず棲みついてしまったようだ
MsgEn:
Near the hideout of Bertha's Bandit Group, there
is an underground waterway flowing.
Armed beasts roam around, but they are tamed.
No orcs have been spotted.
A magical creature that was unleashed to search
for the bandit group's hideout got lost and ended
up settling there.

MsgJp:
アッカーシェラン王家に連なる者、または王家の
ためにその力を尽くした英雄たちが眠る祠
王家の治める地の中でもラスニテ山麓との
縁が深い英雄たちが祀られ、死した後も
人々を見守っているという
MsgEn:
Shrine where the descendants of the Acre Selund
royal family, or the heroes who devoted their
power to the royal family, rest. Among the lands
ruled by the royal family, it is said that the
heroes who have a deep connection with the
Rathnite Foothills are enshrined and continue to
watch over the people even after their death.

MsgJp:
本人が生前に希望、もしくは身寄りがないなど
特殊な事情を背負って散った戦士たちが葬られている
集団墓地。国が乱れる前までは専属の衛士によって
警備されていたが、現在は封鎖。内部がどのような状況
かもわからず、不気味な噂のみが広まっている
MsgEn:
A collective graveyard where warriors who
perished under special circumstances, such as
having no kin, or expressing their desire for it
before their death, are buried.
Before the country fell into chaos, it was
guarded by dedicated soldiers, but now it is
sealed off.
The interior's condition is unknown, and only
eerie rumors have spread.

MsgJp: ラスニテ山麓　湖畔部
ベルタ盗賊団のアジト
英霊眠りし道　ラスニテ山麓
MsgEn: Heroic Spirit Sleeping Path: Rathnite Foothills

エリアの最重要依頼 《フェルヤナ荒原　試練：魔の封印捜査》 が発生

支援品のランクアップ

Rank up of support goods
Unblock area "<SPOT 1101>"

MsgJp:
北東部には、アッカーシェラン王国にとっての要衝
である《展望城》が存在する。通常、王族が居留
することはなく、兵士たちによる防衛拠点として機能
していた。水脈が豊富である一方で水はけの悪い地質
であり、ぬかるみや滝が多いため足元には注意が必要
MsgEn:
In the northeastern region, there is a critical
stronghold for the Kingdom of Acre Selund, called
"Lookout Castle."
It usually functions as a defensive base for the
soldiers and is not typically inhabited by the
royal family.
The area has abundant water veins, but due to its
poor drainage, there are many muddy areas and
waterfalls, requiring caution when walking.

MsgJp:
戦禍を逃れてきた人たちが、森の中で
息を潜めるように、しかししたたかに支え合って
暮らしている非常に小さな集落
避難民の中に統率力に優れる者がいるらしく
今のところ比較的安定した生活を送っている
MsgEn:
A very small settlement where people who have
escaped from the ravages of war live hidden in the
forest.
They support each other cunningly yet quietly,
living together.
Among the refugees, there seems to be someone
with exceptional leadership skills, and they are
currently leading a relatively stable life.

MsgJp:
かつては蛮族の地と呼ばれた南部地方に睨みを
きかせる要衝として建造された
アッカーシェラン大陸ではメガド離宮、王都メガドに
次いで古い建造物。城主はアッカー家の当主だが
実質的な管理者である“城番”は兵士が就くことが
できる最高位とされている
MsgEn:
In the southern region, which was once called the
land of barbarians, a strategic point was built to
intimidate the surrounding area.
It is the third oldest structure in the Acre
Selund continent, following the Megado Detached
Palace and the Royal Capital Megado.
While the lord of the Acre family is the castle
owner, the "Castle Sentinel", who is the actual
administrator, is considered the highest position
that soldiers can hold.

MsgJp:
河の流れによって様々なものが漂着する河岸
上流から流されてきたものの中には、解放軍の戦士
たちだけでなく魔軍の獣の死骸も多数存在する
流れ着いた骸から出でたものか、死臭に惹かれて
きたものか、骨になっても徘徊する魔物が徘徊する
MsgEn:
By the flow of the river, various things drift
and accumulate on the riverbank.
Among the things carried downstream, there are
not only soldiers of the Liberation Army, but also
many carcasses of the enemy's animals.
Whether they emerged from the washed-up corpses
or were attracted by the stench of death,
wandering monsters continue to wander even in
their skeletal forms.

MsgJp:
丘の上を縄張りとするゴブリン族の住処
一際凶暴なグレーターゴブリン《小鬼殺しのオジナ》
がリーダーとなっている。オジナは仲間をも攻撃
する残虐さで群れを支配しており、手下たちは
恐怖からか異常なまでの興奮状態にある
MsgEn:
Goblin territory on top of the hill.
Led by the exceptionally vicious Greater Goblin,
Ogina, known as the "Kobold Killer".
Ogina dominates the pack with his cruelness,
attacking even his own allies, and his
subordinates are in an abnormally excited state,
perhaps out of fear.

MsgJp:
魔軍が進軍する際に通過する中継地
ここで一旦の補給や、オークたちが使役する
魔物の装甲を手入れしてから目的地へ出発
しているとの情報が寄せられている
MsgEn:
Intermediate point through which the demon army
passes when advancing.
It has been reported that they temporarily
replenish supplies here and Orcs maintain their
armor before departing for their destination.

MsgJp:
アッカーシェラン大陸の西域に広がる大湿地帯
その広さ故に、古来から戦場になることが多い
傷を負って死を待つばかりの兵たちの嘆きが
絶えることがなかったと伝えられている
MsgEn:
The vast swamp spreads to the western region of
Acre Selund Continent.
Due to its size, it has often been a battlefield
since ancient times.
It is said that the lament of soldiers who were
only waiting for death while wounded never ceased.

MsgJp:
フェルヤナ地方の外れにある門。そこを抜けると
魔軍の拠点に繋がるらしく、魔軍側も警戒を
強める最近では大門の前にまで野営地が拡がり
見張りの魔物が日夜目を光らせている
MsgEn:
Gate located at the outskirts of Feryana region.
It seems to connect to the demon army's base, and
recently, the demon army has been increasing their
vigilance.
The encampment has expanded all the way to the
front of the main gate, and the guarding monsters
keep their eyes shining day and night.

MsgJp:
年老いた奇面獣《ブルータルハーミット》の住処
人々の間ではその恐ろしさが代々語り継がれる
ほどであり、周囲に近寄ろうとする者はまずいない
しかし、魔軍はこの強力な奇面獣をなんとか利用
しようと捕獲を目論んでいるようだ
MsgEn:
The lair of the aged beast, Brutal Hermit.
Its terror has been passed down through
generations, so much so that few dare to approach
it.
However, the Demon Army seems intent on capturing
and somehow harnessing the power of this
formidable creature.

MsgJp:
森を抜けて展望城へと向かう兵士たちが
ことごとくこの周辺にて魔物の襲撃を受けている
どうやら人間を待ち伏せするに格好の場所
として魔軍に認識されているようだ
MsgEn:
Soldiers heading towards Lookout Castle after
passing through the forest have all been attacked
by monsters in this area.
It seems that this place has been recognized by
the Demon Army as a perfect location to ambush
humans.

MsgJp:
展望城の目前に広がる湿地帯全域を監視
している魔軍拠点。監視対象としている範囲が
広いため、魔軍に使役されるナイトメアが空からも
目を光らせる。要衝である展望城に近いせいか
数多くの兵器が配備されていることがわかっている
MsgEn:
This is a base for the Demon Army that monitors
the entire marshy area that stretches in front of
the observatory castle. Because the area being
monitored is wide, nightmares are used by the
Demon Army keep an eye on it from the sky. It is
known that a large number of weapons are deployed
in the area due to its proximity to the Lookout
Castle, which is a key
point.

MsgJp:
王家の次期当主がその力を示すために
代々使われてきた地下道。内部には強力な
守護者が配置されているとみられるが、これまで
王家の者以外が足を踏み入れられることは
無かったため、情報に乏しい
MsgEn:
The underground passage that has been used by the
next head of the royal family to demonstrate his
power.
It is believed that powerful guardians are placed
inside, but there is little information as no one
other than the royal family has ever set foot in
there.

MsgJp:
《森の隠れ村》にほど近い古い祠
アッカーシェランの大地に満ちた炎の気が滞留し
内部に足を踏み入れるとじっとりとした熱さを感じる
悪意を秘めたままに落命した者は、その悪意
を忘れ去るまで魂を焼かれながら祠を徘徊するという
MsgEn:
An old shrine near the "Forest's Hidden Village".
It is filled with the lingering flame in the land
of Acre Selund.
Once you step inside, you can feel the damp heat.
It is said that those who died with malice in
their hearts will roam the shrine, their souls
burning until they forget their malice.

MsgJp:
王族のみが知りえた隠れ道
有事の際は隠れ家としても使えるよう工夫されて
おり、最低限の施設は整っている
王家の統治が行き届くようになってからは
使われることもなくなり、忘れ去られていた
MsgEn:
The hidden passage that only the royal family
knew about was designed to also serve as a hiding
place in times of emergency.
It had the minimum necessary facilities.
Since the governance of the royal family became
more meticulous, it was no longer used and
forgotten.

MsgJp:
遺跡をそのまま活用した魔軍の拠点
しばらく出入りが途絶えた後も本拠点から
魔軍が進行するなどの様子から、一時的な
滞在ではなく、この場で一通りの生活が
できるように設計されているものと思われる
MsgEn:
The demon army's base, which has been constructed
by utilizing ruins as is.
From the fact that the demon army continues to
advance even after there has been no activity for
a while, it is believed that this base is designed
for not just temporary stays, but for living a
complete life here after all.

MsgJp:
古くより放棄されたままとなっていた地下水道
既に水はほぼ枯れたものと思われていたが
何者かが侵入した形跡が発見され、調査される
こととなった。内部にはおびただしいほどの不死者や
思念体がはびこっているが、発生の原因は不明
MsgEn:
Long abandoned, the underground sewage system was
thought to have already dried up.
However, evidence of someone's intrusion was
discovered and further investigation was
initiated.
Inside, an overwhelming number of undead beings
were rampant, but the cause of their emergence
remains unknown.

MsgJp:
アッカーシェラン王家に連なる者、または王家の
ためにその力を尽くした英雄たちが眠る遺跡
英霊は王家に危機が迫る時あらば再び
呼び声に応じ、その力を貸すといわれる
MsgEn:
The royal descendants of the Acre Selund family,
or the heroes who exerted their power for the sake
of the royal family, rest in this shrine.
When the royal family is in imminent danger, it
is said that the heroic spirits respond to the
call and lend their power.

MsgJp:
この大陸にアッカー王家が誕生する遥か昔から
大地を蝕む強大な魔物が棲息していた――という
話は、アッカーシェランの国民ならば一度は
聞いたことがある昔話である。物語の結末は
「魔物は王によって地下深く封印された」となる
MsgEn:
Since ancient times, there has been a tale that
tells of powerful monsters residing in this land,
where the Acre royal family was born.
If you are a citizen of Acre Selund, you have
surely heard this story once before.
The conclusion of the tale is that "the monsters
were sealed deep underground by the king."

MsgJp:
フェルヤナ荒原南部、多数のオークが出入りする洞窟
自然の洞窟を利用した拠点のように偽装しているが
内部が強力な兵器を集めた武器庫として使われている
ことは、時折洞窟の奥から響く轟音から明らかである
MsgEn:
In the southern area of the Feryana Wilderness,
there is a cave where numerous orcs come and go.
It is disguised as a natural cave, but it is
evident from the occasional roar that echoes from
the depths of the cave that it is actually being
used as an arsenal gathering powerful weapons.
Dark Path to the Secret Spring

MsgJp: 英霊眠りし道　フェルヤナ荒原
MsgEn: Heroic Spirit Sleeping Path: Feryana Wilderness

MsgEn:
Area's most important request "Megadosys Plateau
Trial: Shadow of Heresy" available

MsgJp:
アッカーシェラン大陸のほぼ中央に位置する地域
荒涼とした風景が広がるこの地域には竜の神殿があり、
その神殿に寄り添うように王都メガドが建造された
要塞を思わせる王都はアッカー家三代目当主キリークの
治世に計画され、完成は十四代目当主ドラフの
即位目前であった
MsgEn:
Located almost in the centre of Acre Selund, this
area is characterized by a barren landscape.
In this region, there is a dragon temple, and
adjacent to the temple, the royal capital of
Megado was built, resembling a fortress.
The construction of this royal capital was
planned during the reign of Kilik, the third head
of the Acre family, and it was completed just
before the coronation of Doraf, the fourteenth
head.

MsgJp:
メガドシスの土地に焼きついた歴史の世界
悪しき竜が現れたことにより、各地を巡る竜力にも
異変が起きた。その結果、土地の持っている“記憶”
というべきものにすら歪みが生じているようだ
MsgEn:
The world of history engraved into the land of
Megado.
Various anomalies have occurred in the Dragon
Force that travel across the land, due to the
appearance of the evil dragon.
As a result, even the "memories" that the land
holds seem to have become distorted.

MsgJp:
メガド周辺を警備する目的で使われる監視塔
すでに地上階は魔軍により占拠されているが
魔物たちは地下階の存在には気付かなかったようだ
地下階には、メガド陥落の折に逃げ延びた兵士たちが
救援を信じ、息を殺すように潜んでいる
MsgEn:
A surveillance tower is used to secure the
surroundings of Megado.
The ground floors have already been occupied by
the demon army, but it seems like they were
unaware of the existence of the underground
floors.
Soldiers who managed to escape during the fall of
Megado are hiding in the underground floors,
holding their breath as they believe in the
possibility of rescue.

MsgJp:
王家に仕えるハイセプター、キルスティが住む小屋
魔物によって民が苦しむアッカーシェランを憂い
秘術であるハイセプターの戦闘術を世に広めんと
慣れぬあばら家で暮らしているらしい
MsgEn:
The cottage where Kirsty, serving the royal
family, lives.
She worries about Acre Selund, where the people
suffer due to monsters.
Thus, she endeavors to spread the combat
techniques of the High Scepter, a secret art.
It seems that she lives in an unfamiliar, rundown
house.

MsgJp:
城塞都市メガドにて一般市民が住まう居住層
メガド全体から見ると下層にあたり、大陸の人口の
過半数が暮らしていた
長きに渡り繁栄を誇っていたが、魔軍の急襲に
よって蹂躙され、多くの住民が命を落とした
MsgEn:
In the residential layer of Fortress City Megado,
where ordinary citizens reside, it is known as the
lower level and where over half of the continent's
population lived.
It had been prosperous for a long time, but it
was devastated by a sudden attack from the Demon
Army, and many residents lost their lives.

MsgJp:
白い木で作られた簡易な柵は、アンセスターオークが
縄張りを誇示する際に多用されるもの
賢明な旅人であれば忌避すべき“危険”の標である
MsgEn:
The simple fence made of white wood is often used
by Ancestor Orcs to showcase their territory, and
it serves as a "danger" sign that wise travelers
should avoid.

MsgJp:
火垂れ山から飛来した巨大な噴石とその周辺
岩は鳥が羽根を休め、獣が身を隠すのに
ちょうどよかったらしく様々な獣たちが住処として
いるようだ
MsgEn:
A huge volcanic rock from the Firefall Mountain
and its surrounding rocks were perfect for birds
to rest their feathers and for animals to hide.
It seems that various animals have made this
place their habitat.

MsgJp:
水辺に面した小さな洞穴
霧の森から漏れ出でたものが留まりやすい
風の音が何事かを囁いているように聞こえる
ことから、以前より不気味な噂が立っている
MsgEn:
A small cave facing the water's edge where things
leaking out of the Forest of Mist tend to stay.
The sound of the wind seems to whisper something,
which has led to eerie rumors for some time now.

MsgJp:
霧の森の中にある焼け野原
忌まわしい考えに取り付かれたある女が
多数の犠牲者を洗脳し、自ら炎の中へと
飛び込ませたという事件が起こった場所
事件から何十年と経過しているが、未だに
土は焼けたままであり草木も回復していない
MsgEn:
A burnt field in the Forest of Mist.
This is where a woman obsessed with abominable
thoughts brainwashed numerous victims and forced
them to jump
into the flames themselves.
Decades have passed since the incident, yet the
soil remains burned and the grass and trees have
not recovered.

MsgJp:
城塞都市メガドの城門外に設えられた詰所
元は商人らが優先的にメガドへ入るための手続きを
受けていた場であるが、現在は出撃の令を待つ
ドワーフオークや、軍属の獣たちがひしめいている
MsgEn:
Outside the gates of the fortress city Megado,
there is a guard post set up.
Originally, it was a place where merchants would
go through the necessary procedures to enter
Megado.
However, it is now crowded with dwarf orcs and
military animals waiting for the order to march
out.

MsgJp:
メガド居住層の奥に造られた野ざらしの牢屋
魔軍の襲撃から逃げられず、また不幸にも生け捕りに
された人々がドワーフオークから無残な拷問を受けた
であろうことは、その場に生々しく残る痕跡から容易
に察することができる
MsgEn:
Hidden prison exposed beyond the depths of the
Megado residential layer; it is easy to deduce
from the vivid traces left behind that the
unfortunate individuals who were unable to escape
the onslaught of the Demon Army have fallen into
the hands of the Orcs and likely suffered gruesome
torture.

MsgJp:
王家の命により封鎖されている地下道
王族関連施設に繋がるであろうという
推測以外、情報が無い場所でもある
何らかの意図を持って隠されている場で
あることは確かだ
MsgEn:
The underground passage is sealed off by the
royal family's orders.
It is a place where there is no information other
than speculation that it may be connected to
facilities related to the royal family.
It is certain that it is hidden with some
intention.

MsgJp:
城塞都市メガドの防衛の要となるニルビリス大橋と
その上に建つ関所。魔軍側も本関所の重要性は
理解しているらしく、防衛のために随時戦力を
割いている。関所の開閉については、魔軍の
集結具合と連動しているらしい
MsgEn:
The Nilviris Bridge, which serves as a crucial
defense point for the fortress city of Megado,
accompanied by a checkpoint built on top of it.
It appears that the Demon Army also understands
the importance of this checkpoint, as they are
constantly dedicating forces to its defense.
The opening and closing of the checkpoint seem to
be synchronized with the gathering of the Demon
Army.

MsgJp:
メガド城壁内、最奥に位置する広場
ドワーフオークが捕えた魔物に対して戦甲を
装着するために使われている。魔物は戦甲に
よって自らの意思を制御され、ドワーフオークに
使役される存在となる
MsgEn:
Inside Megado Castle, at the very back, there is
a plaza where beasts captured by Dwarf Orcs are
dressed in battle armor.
The enemies are controlled by the battle armor,
making them subservient to the Dwarf Orcs.

MsgJp:
フェルヤナ荒原の山壁側からメガドシス高地
中心部を繋ぐ通路。かつては頻繁に使われていたが
渓谷を渡る船や家畜を使っての山越えが主流となって
からは、たまに狩人らが利用するのみとなっていた
メガド周辺が魔軍に包囲された際、徒歩での脱出を
試みる者にはこの古道しか残されていなかった
MsgEn:
From the mountain wall side of the Feryana
Wilderness to the center of the Megadosys Plateau,
there is a pathway.
It used to be frequently used, but now crossing
the mountains using livestock or ships to cross
the valley has become the mainstream.
Only occasionally do hunters use it now.
When the area around Megado was surrounded by the
Demon Army, those who attempted to escape on foot
had no choice but to use this ancient path.

MsgJp:
大地の陥没からなる自然豊かな洞窟
目立たない場所に位置することと、陽の光が差し込む
構造から内部には緑が生い茂り、野生動物たちが棲む
今となっては、悪しき竜と魔軍の所業によって荒廃する
前の“アッカーシェランの自然”が残る貴重な場所
MsgEn:
A natural and abundant cave formed by the
collapse of the surface.
Located in an inconspicuous place, it is filled
with greenery and inhabited by wild animals,
thanks to the structure that allows sunlight to
penetrate it.
It is now in a state of ruin due to the deeds of
the evil dragon and the demon army.
This is a precious place where the remnants of
the previous "Self" of Acre Selund remain.

MsgJp: ニルビリス大橋からメガド居住層へと繋がる地下水路
MsgEn:
From Nilviris Bridge, an underground waterway
leads to the Megado residential layer.

MsgJp:
城塞都市メガド市民の生活を支える上水道
都市には無くてはならない設備だが、汚水を飲む
ことに慣れたドワーフオークたちは重要性を見出さず
魔軍の中継基地として使っている
MsgEn:
Fortress City Megado's water supply supports the
lives of its citizens.
Although it is an essential facility for the
city, the Dwarf Orcs, who have become accustomed
to drinking sewage, fail to recognize its
importance and instead use it as a relay base for
the Demon Army.

MsgJp:
メガド王宮層の周辺には王宮層を取り囲むように
複数の建造物が円形に立ち並び、それぞれ左右に
伸びた通路で繋がっている。元は回廊であったため
現在もそれらの建造物の総称として≪メガド回廊≫
という呼称が用いられている
MsgEn:
Around the Megado Palace on the Megado Royal
Layer, multiple buildings are arranged in a
circle, connected by corridors extending left and
right.
Originally a corridor, they are still
collectively referred to as the "Megado Corridor."

MsgJp:
城塞都市メガドの最上部に位置する王宮
王族とそれに連なる限られた者のみが居住する
ことを許された場所であり、厳重に守られている
一般市民がこの場を直に目にすることは
人生の中で恐らく一度も無いだろう
MsgEn:
At the top of Fortress City Megado stands the
royal palace, a place allowed only to the royal
family and a select few.
It is heavily guarded and unlikely for ordinary
citizens to ever lay eyes upon in their lifetime.

MsgJp:
メガド王宮層を囲むように建てられた建造物の内
聖堂として使われていた場所
王族の挙式や戴冠式の際は、大陸中から集まった
有力な貴族が一堂に会する
MsgEn:
Within the buildings built around the Megado
Royal Palace Layer, a place that was used as a
cathedral.
During royal weddings and coronations, prominent
nobles from all over the continent would gather
together.

MsgJp:
戦士の修行を目的とし、様々な種類の魔物が
わざと放たれている祠。以前は王族を護る者たちが
平時にあってもその腕を鈍らせないようにと鍛練に
励んでいた場所であるが、近年はひたすらに武を
誇る風潮が薄れたため使用されることも減り、内部の
魔物のみが取り残されている
MsgEn:
The shrine, which is intentionally filled with
various types of enemies, serves as a training
ground for soldiers.
In the past, it was a place where those who
protected the royal family trained to keep their
skills sharp even during times of peace.
However, in recent years, the enthusiasm for
showcasing one's martial prowess has diminished,
resulting in a decrease in its usage.
As a result, only the monsters inside the shrine
remain.

MsgJp: 城塞都市メガド 居住層
城塞都市メガド 王宮層
MsgEn: Fortress City Megado: Royal Palace Level

支援品のランクアップ
封鎖エリアが開放《<SPOT 1103>》
MsgEn:
Rank up of support goods
Unblock area "<SPOT 1103>"

MsgJp:
ウルテカ山岳　西部、城塞都市メガドからは
北西にあたり、メガド離宮を通り抜けた先に
広がる一帯。周辺は火山地帯のため、緑が
少ないが、この一帯には珍しく草木が茂る様が
見られる
MsgEn:
Located in the western region of the Urteca
Mountains, to the northwest of the fortress city
of Megado, it is an area that stretches beyond the
Megado Detached Palace.
Due to the volcanic nature of the surrounding
area, there is little greenery, but this area is
rare in that it is lush with vegetation.

MsgJp:
城塞都市メガドからちょうど北側にあたる一帯
元々アンセスターオークの集落が多数存在しており
“悪しき竜”出現以前から危険な場所として
認識されていた。時折腕の立つハンターが
稀少な動植物を狙って立ち入るのみであり
人の手が殆ど入っていない
MsgEn:
In the area just north of Fortress City Megado,
there were originally many settlements of Ancestor
Orcs.
It has long been recognized as a hazardous
location, even before the emergence of the "Evil
Dragon".
Occasionally, capable hunters enter only to
gather rare plants and animals, and there is
little human involvement.

MsgJp:
城塞都市メガドの東側にあたる一帯
悪しき竜の影響により、炎を纏った数多の
命の残骸がさ迷い、徘徊している
悪しき竜の影響が色濃く出ている場所といえる
MsgEn:
Located on the eastern side of the fortress city
Megado, this area is heavily influenced by the
evil dragon.
Numerous charred remains, engulfed in flames,
wander aimlessly, a testament to the dragon's
malevolence.

MsgJp:
ウルテカの土地に焼きついた歴史の世界
悪しき竜の影響により、土地の持つ“記憶”
というべきものにも歪みが生じ、本来の
ウルテカの歴史とは異なった姿を見せる
MsgEn:
The world of history engraved into the land of
Urteca.
Due to the influence of the Evil Dragon, even the
"memories" that the land possesses have become
distorted, showing a different appearance from the
true history of Urteca.

MsgJp:
アッカーシェラン大陸の南部にアジトを構え
定住しつつ活動するベルタ盗賊団とは異なり
通称“北の盗賊”と呼ばれる彼らは、一定期間ごとに
アジトを変えて活動している。その姿勢からも
わかる通り、警戒心が強く、自らの存在を徹底的に
隠す傾向にある
MsgEn:
Unlike Bertha's Bandit Group, who have a
stronghold in the southern part of Acre Selund,
they are known as "Northern Bandits" and change
their hideout at regular intervals.
They are very cautious and tend to conceal their
presence thoroughly, as can be seen from their
attitude.

MsgJp:
《聖炎の参竜道》へと続く扉の前に
急きょ設営された野営地。厳しいウルテカ山岳の
環境に負けず、宿やよろず屋といった覚者隊のための
設備を維持すべく、王家に仕える兵のみならず
盗賊も手を貸している
MsgEn:
In front of the door leading to the "Sacred Flame
Path," a temporary camp has been hastily set up.
Despite the harsh environment of the Urteca
Mountains, the facilities for the Arisen Corps,
such as inns and general shops, are being
maintained not only by the soldiers serving the
royal family, but also with the help of bandits.

MsgJp:
小さな群れを作って生活するサラマンダーだが
繁殖のため、一時的に大きな群れを成して
生活することもある。外敵から身を隠すことができ
適度な湿度・温度に保たれる洞穴などは
そのような場所に選ばれやすい
MsgEn:
Salamanders live in small groups, but for
breeding purposes, they occasionally form large
herds and live together.
They hide from predators in caves or other places
where the humidity and temperature are kept at an
appropriate level.

MsgJp:
城塞都市メガドを臨み、振り返れば悠然たる
火垂れ山がよく見える眺望スポット。しかし今や
肉食動物や魔物が徘徊し、腐肉や死骸が
転がる殺伐とした広場となっている。メガドに
これほどまでに近い場所に魔物が現れるように
なったのはごく最近のことだ
MsgEn:
Approaching the fortress city of Megado, when I
turned around, I saw a serene view of Firefall
Mountain.
Nowadays, it has become a grim plaza where
carnivorous animals and monsters roam, with
rotting flesh and corpses scattered around.
It is only recently that monsters have started to
appear in a place so close to Megado.

MsgJp:
橋を渡り、王家の墓へと侵攻しようとする
ドワーフオークを、王家の兵士たちが命を賭して
食い止めてきた場所。兵士、ドワーフオーク両者の
亡骸が無造作に転がっており、静かな場所ながら
激戦の痕跡を残す
MsgEn:
Crossing the bridge, soldiers of the royal family
risked their lives to stop the Dwarf Orcs from
invading the Royal Family Mausoleum.
The corpses of both soldiers and Dwarf Orcs lay
scattered haphazardly, leaving behind traces of a
fierce battle in this quiet place.

MsgJp:
《王家の墓》付近にある小さな洞窟
これまでは注目されてこなかった場所だが
ドワーフオークが出入りする姿や、手勢の
魔獣を置いていく様子が確認されている
内部に何らかの秘密があるのかもしれない
MsgEn:
Near the "Royal Family Mausoleum" is a small
cave, which has not attracted much attention until
now.
However, there have been sightings of Dwarf Orcs
coming in and out, as well as witnessing them
leaving their animals.
There may be some kind of secret inside.

MsgJp:
アンセスターオークたちが棲息する、とても
原始的な拠点のようなもの。実際には集団で
生活しているだけの縄張りのようなものかと
思われているが、ヘルハウンドを家畜のように
飼い慣らしている節が見受けられる点には
今後も警戒が必要だろう
MsgEn:
A primitive base-like habitat where Ancestor Orcs
dwell.
It is believed to be a territory where they
simply live in groups, but caution will be
necessary in the future, as there seems to be a
tendency to tame Hellhounds like livestock.

MsgJp:
ウルテカ山岳　東部にある資材置き場
ここにあるものはメガド市街にて使用される資材
だが、資材をここに集約しているというよりかは
市街に持ち込むための検査を受けるための
一時的な保管所といった位置付けのものだ
MsgEn:
Urteca Mountains' Eastern Materials Storage Area.
The items found here are materials used in the
city of Megado.
However, instead of being a centralized location
for materials, it serves as a temporary storage
facility for inspections before being brought into
the city.

MsgJp:
ウルテカ山岳　北部は元よりアンセスターオークや
その他の魔獣が多く生息する一帯であったが
戦乱によってそれぞれの住処に変化が生じたようだ
ここでは特にアンセスターオークの群れが勢いを
持っている様子が報告され、要注意スポットである
MsgEn:
In the north, there used to be home to many
Ancestor Orcs and other magical creatures.
Due to the ongoing conflict, there have been
changes in their respective habitats.
It has been reported that particularly in this
area, there is a strong presence of Ancestor Orc
herds, making it a spot that requires caution.

MsgJp:
本来であれば、死して大地に還るはずの魂が
何らかの理由で炎をまとった影として徘徊する
ことがある。ここにはそのような魔物が集まりやすい
らしく、駆除しなければ集まる魔物の数は
増えるばかりだ
MsgEn:
Souls that were supposed to return to the earth
in death sometimes wander as shadows clad in
flames for some reason.
It seems that such creatures tend to gather here,
and if they are not exterminated, the number of
creatures that gather only increases.

MsgJp:
アッカーシェランでは竜は、すなわち、王でもある
離宮は竜となった王が人々と交流する神殿として
有史以前に造られた。以降、時々の王によって
改修、改装が行われて現在の姿になっている
MsgEn:
In Acre Selund, the dragon is also the king.
The palace was built as a temple for the king who
became a dragon to interact with the people in
prehistoric times. Since then, it has been
renovated and refurbished by occasional kings and
has become its current form.

MsgJp:
代々のアッカー家にて竜にならなかった者たちが
眠る墓地。アッカー家以外でも友好関係にあった
豪族も埋葬が許されている
かつては財宝の数々が死者を飾っていたが、ほとんどが
オークとゴブリンに持ち去られた。南北の盗賊団は
関与を否定してる。
MsgEn:
The cemetery where those from the Acre family,
who did not become dragons, lie sleeping.
Even noble families who had a friendly
relationship with the Acre family are allowed to
be buried here.
Once, numerous treasures adorned the deceased,
but most were taken away by orcs and goblins.
The northern and southern bandits deny
involvement.

MsgJp:
旅人たちの簡易宿としても使われていた経緯がある
自然洞窟。各地の宿が発達したこともあり、百年
ほど前には完全に放棄されている。現在は戦乱により
住処を追われた魔物が棲みついているようだ。魔物
同士は敵対することもなく静かに暮らしているようだが
侵入者とみなした人間には確実に襲い掛かるだろう
MsgEn:
There is a history of a natural cave being used
as a simple accommodation for travelers.
Due to the development of accommodations in
various places, it was completely abandoned about
a hundred years ago. Currently, it seems that
monsters, driven from their homes by war, have
taken up residence there.
The monsters live quietly with no hostility
towards each other, but they will surely attack
anyone they consider an intruder.

MsgJp:
小さなほこらの壁面が崩れ、その先に
謎の空間が確認できている。空間は奥に続いている
ため、不要になった貯蔵庫の類を埋めたものでは
ないようだ
MsgEn:
The wall of a small shrine has collapsed,
revealing a mysterious space beyond.
The space continues further back, suggesting that
it is not simply filled with unused storage items.

MsgJp:
民間人が竜への敬意を示すために参拝する寺院
大変古くからあるため、一見すると廃墟のようだが
アッカーシェランの人間にとっては憧れの場でもある
聖職者たちが参拝者への対応に当たっていたが
現在は魔物に乗っ取られてしまい、この場を守る
者たちも完全に退避している
MsgEn:
Private individuals visit the temple to show
respect to the dragon.
Despite its appearance of being in ruins at first
glance, it is also a place of longing for the
people of Acre Selund.
Clergymen used to handle interactions with
visitors, but the place has now been taken over by
enemies.
Those who protect this place have completely
evacuated.

MsgJp:
火竜が休息をとる火垂れ山内部へと至る道
基本的には王家の人間が稀に通るのみであり
細工の凝った巨大な門は、代々門番の家系である
バシアス、もしくは王家の人間にしか開門できない
MsgEn:
The road leads to the interior of Firefall
Mountain, where the Fire Dragon rests.
Usually, only members of the royal family pass
through.
The intricately crafted enormous gate can only be
opened by the gatekeeper lineage, the Bacias, or
members of the royal family.

MsgJp:
突如現れた不気味な竜族の魔物が巣食う広間
アッカーシェランではこれまでその姿を見た者や
存在を知る者は誰一人としておらず、恐らく
悪しき竜によって造り出されたか、召喚された魔物
だろうと推測される
MsgEn:
A grand hall infested with creepy dragonkin
creatures that suddenly appeared.
No one in Acre Selund has ever seen or known of
their existence.
It is presumed that they were either created by
or summoned by the evil dragon.

MsgJp:
地理的に《王家の墓》の反対側に位置する墓場
入り口は厳重に閉ざされ、その位置から
“王家ゆかりではあるが、正しく葬られる価値の無い
行き場の無い人物らの亡骸”を安置する場所で
あったのではないかと推測されている
MsgEn:
Geographically located on the opposite side of
the Royal Tombs, the entrance is tightly closed,
and its location suggests that it may have been a
place where "the corpses of not worthy of a proper
burial, with nowhere else to go" were laid to
rest.
